Multiple failed authentication attempts.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4624 (successful) and 4625 (failed) on authentication servers (AD, remote access gateways). Correlate login events with source IPs from Zeek conn.log for public-facing services. Analyze failed/successful login rates per user/IP. Use time series analysis or IQR to detect unusual login volumes or times for specific accounts, especially from external IPs identified via conn.log or associated with known malicious activity.
